summary.para: This Attribute Maps From Specified Entity Attribute Values To Class Property
You Can Use Any Type But Custom Class Property Type Need To Same Entity Attribute Type
This Attribute parse Money Object's Value Property To Class Property
Class Property Type Must Be Decimal
This Attribute Parse OptionSetValue Object's Value Property To Class Property
Class Property Type Must Be Int
This Attribute Maps From Entity Object's Id Property To Class Property
Class Property Type Must Be Guid And Unique Use Only Once Per Class
This Attribute Maps From EntityReference Object's Id Property To Class Property
Used Property Type Must Be Guid
This Attribute Specifies your Entity Schema Name

member.name: T:D365.Data.ObjectMapper.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:D365.Data.ObjectMapper.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:D365.Data.ObjectMapper.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

summary.para: This Method Mapping Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Entity Or Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.EntityCollection To Your Custom Classes or Generic Collections
This Method Parsing Your Custom Classes To Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Entity
Target Not Accept Collections It Will Throw Error
